summary: 5 new enchants to enhance the power of magic.
descriptionHtml:
Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Add 5 new enchants to enhance alteration, conjuration, destruction, illusion and restoration power.

If you use weapons, you can improve it with smithing, enchanting and perks, and you can do great damage.
But, if you use spells, you only can improve with 2 perks which improve 50% extra damage with one magic type, and the base damage of those spells
not are so good.
So, you only can throw spells madly.

This mod have the solution, you have one enchant for magic type for enchant your equipment.


Details
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The new enchants are comparable to one-handed and two-handed enchants.

You can find those enchants on rings which are sold by college teacher.

Alteration and conjuration can be used on ring, necklace, head and body.
Destruction, illusion and restoration can be used on ring, necklace, head and hands.

My mods.
------------------------------

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/815131/?tb=mods&pUp=1]All my mods[/url]
author: Weich92
